title: Pixel wifi constantly drops and battery life much reduced
content:
My Pixel is suffering from two serious issues that pretty much make it unusable.

Please note: I've tested this using different wi fi routers and have reset the Phone twice and updated it to the latest update. I haven't installed any apps (beyond the ones that come with it).

Wifi -  Unless I'm less than 2 - 3 meters away from a router the connection will drop after a few seconds.

Battery - It drains very quickly. A full charge will last 3 for 4 hours on standby. And it charges slowly.

Other than that, the phone operates well. And it's quick as I haven't installed any apps.

Is this just because the phone is old or a hardware or software issue?

Is there an app that can diagnose the problem?

Cheers,

Lawrence
